summary: DEALER SERVICE DEPARTMENT STATED THIS IS NORMAL WEAR CLEVELAND AREA DUE TO SALT.  ROTOR WARPAGE, EXTREME VIBRATION AND SWAY BAR BUSHINGS FAILURE AT SUCH LOW MILEAGE REPRESENTS DANGEROUS DESIGN FLAW WHICH IS IMPRACTICAL TO COMPENSATE FOR WITH CONSTANT REPLACING OF POORLY DESIGNED AND MANUFACTURED PARTS.  THIS IS IN A VEHICLE WHICH IS TYPICALLY USED TO TRANSPORT FAMILIES AND CHILDREN.  THESE DEFECTS CAUSE ACTUAL LOSS OF CONTROL PROBLEMS ON THE ROAD SHOULD BE ADDRESSED URGENTLY.   *JB    ***DIMSII IVOQ POSTED AFTER 12/12/02 CUT-OVER TO ARTEMIS****742642
